net.rom.utility.system.property

Class SystemProperty<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.rom.utility.system.property.SystemProperty<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the system property value type.
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BooleanProperty, IntProperty, ListProperty, LongProperty, PathProperty, StringProperty

    public abstract class SystemProperty<T>
extends Object
    Represents a system property.

        public final String getKey()
        Returns the key of this SystemProperty.
        Returns:
        the key of this SystemProperty.

      • isEditable

        public final boolean isEditable()
        Returns whether this SystemProperty can be edited by calling set(Object) instead of forceSet(String).
        Returns:
        true if this SystemProperty can be edited by calling set(Object), or otherwise false.

      • hasValue

        public final boolean hasValue()
        Returns whether this SystemProperty has a value.
        Returns:
        true if this SystemProperty has a non-null raw string value, or otherwise false.

      • hasValidValue

        public final boolean hasValidValue()
        Returns whether this SystemProperty has a valid value.
        Returns:
        true if this SystemProperty has a valid value, or otherwise false. A SystemProperty has a valid value if it has a non-null raw string value, and get() also returns a non-null value.

      • getRaw

        public final @Nullable String getRaw()
        Returns this SystemProperty's raw string value.
        Returns:
        this SystemProperty's raw string value.

      • get

        public abstract T get()
        Returns this SystemProperty's value.
        Returns:
        this SystemProperty's value.

      • get

        public final T get(T defaultValue)
        Returns this SystemProperty's value if it is non-null. Otherwise, the specified default value is returned.
        Parameters:
        defaultValue - a default value.
        Returns:
        this SystemProperty's value if it is non-null, or otherwise the specified default value.

      • set

        public final T set(T value)
        Sets this SystemProperty's value to the specified value.
        Parameters:
        value - a value.
        Returns:
        the previous value of this SystemProperty.
        Throws:
        UnsupportedOperationException - if isEditable() returns false.

      • forceSet

        public final @Nullable String forceSet(@Nullable String value)
        Sets this SystemProperty's raw string value to the specified value. This works regardless of the value returned by isEditable(), and no validation is performed on the new value.
        Parameters:
        value - a raw string value.
        Returns:
        the previous raw string value of this SystemProperty.

      • valueEquals

        public final boolean valueEquals(T value)
        Returns whether this SystemProperty's value is equivalent to the specified value.
        Parameters:
        value - a value.
        Returns:
        true if Objects.equals(Object, Object) returns true for both this SystemProperty's value and the specified value, or otherwise false.

      • stringEquals

        public final boolean stringEquals(String value)
        Returns whether toString() is equivalent to the specified string value.
        Parameters:
        value - a string value.
        Returns:
        true if toString() is equivalent to the specified string value, or otherwise false.

      • rawValueEquals

        public final boolean rawValueEquals(@Nullable String value)
        Returns whether this SystemProperty's raw string value is equivalent to the specified raw string value.
        Parameters:
        value - a raw string value.
        Returns:
        true if getRaw() is equivalent to the specified raw string value, or otherwise false.

      • toRawString

        protected String toRawString(T value)
        Converts the specified value to a raw string value.
        Parameters:
        value - a non-null value.
        Returns:
        the raw string value representation of the specified value.

      • getProperty

        public static @Nullable String getProperty(String key)
        Returns the raw string value of the system property with the specified key.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the raw string value of the system property with the specified key.

      • getProperty

        public static String getProperty(String key,
                                 String defaultValue)
        Returns the raw string value of the system property with the specified key, or the specified default value if it is null.
        Parameters:
        key - a system property key.
        defaultValue - a default raw string value.
        Returns:
        the raw string value of the system property with the specified key, or the specified default value if it is null.

      • setProperty

        public static @Nullable String setProperty(String key,
                                           @Nullable String value)
        Sets the raw string value of the system property with the specified key to the specified raw string value.
        Parameters:
        key - a system property key.
        value - a raw string value.
        Returns:
        the previous raw string value of the system property.
